name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault
display_help: Focus pure energy into deadly melee attacks and powerful projectiles. The impact of the melee powers can often Disorient opponents, while the velocity of the ranged projectiles can send your enemies flying.

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault.Power_Bolt
powers.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 20.00% chance for 1.5 magnitude knock on target
20.00% chance for 1.5 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault.Bone_Smasher
powers.display_help: This melee attack can be slow, but it compensates by dealing a good amount of damage and having a good chance to Disorient the target. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. This power will weaken the target's secondary effects if used while in Energy Focus mode. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 11.92s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 4s on target
60.00% chance for 3.0 stun for 17.88s on target
60.00% chance for 1.0 stun for 4s on target

-37.25% strength to healing, ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique, defense, absorption, endurance, to hit, run speed, fly speed, confuse, terrorize, hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 10s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault.Power_Push
powers.display_help: Power Push deals a high amount of Energy and Smashing damage and sends the target flying for a great distance. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged High DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault.Power_Blast
powers.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 30.00% chance for 2.1 magnitude knock on target
30.00% chance for 2.1 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault.Power_Boost
powers.display_help: Boosts the damage and secondary effects of your powers. Your powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Up last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

display_info: 74.50% strength to healing, ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique, defense, absorption, endurance, to hit, run speed, fly speed, confuse, terrorize, hold, immobilize, stun, sleep for 10s on self
34.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault.Whirling_Hands
powers.display_help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be Disoriented as well. This power will inflict bonus damage if used while in Energy Focus mode. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 7.45s on target
30.00% chance for 2.0 stun for 4s on target

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault.Total_Focus
powers.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This melee attack is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. This power will enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault.Sniper_Blast
powers.display_help: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. If used against a Disoriented foe, there is a small chance to enter Energy Focus mode. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Dominator_Assault.Energy_Assault.Power_Burst
powers.display_help: A devastating attack that can knock your target off their feet. This power will inflict bonus damage if used while in Energy Focus mode. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 60.00% chance for 4.2 magnitude knock on target
60.00% chance for 4.2 magnitude knock on target
